title: Word Game Schema
description: An array of word game clues and answers. Must include at least one clue for each game type: pictionary, hangman, and crossword.

items.description: An object representing a word clue and its answer. For pictionary, the answer must be an easy to illustrate word.

clue.description: Clue that describes the word. Can be a definition, synonym, hint, or sentence to complete

answer.description: The answer to the clue. Preferably a single word without spaces or special characters.
